data.text2:
Both cordon survey teams have completed their tasks and have returned to the staging area after decon.

The team that performed ground measurements found no contamination greater than background.

Both air samples were initially analyzed at the staging area using the ADM-300 with beta probe.

While ground measurements were consistent with background, there was still a detectable dose rate outside the northwest corner of the storage facility once shielding was put in place. The 2 mR/hr line was determined to be 35 ft from that corner.
